content.question: Shown above is a slope field for which of the following differential equations?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of y with respect to x equals, the fraction with numerator y plus 1, and denominator x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y with respect to x equals, the fraction with numerator, the negative of open parenthesis, y plus 1, close parenthesis, and denominator x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y with respect to x equals, the fraction with numerator y minus 1, and denominator x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y with respect to x equals, the fraction with numerator, the negative of open parenthesis, y minus 1, close parenthesis, and denominator x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of y with respect to x equals, the fraction with numerator y plus 1, and denominator x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
